00022 TextRenderable::TextRenderable(const string& name) : font(NULL), fontName(""), alignment(ALIGN_CENTER), text("")
00023 {
00024     this->name = name;
00025 }
00026 
00027 TextRenderable::~TextRenderable()
00028 {
00029     if (font != NULL)
00030         delete font;
00031     removeAllUsers();
00032     removeFromRenderOriginators();
00033 }
00034 
00035 void TextRenderable::setFont(const string& name)
00036 {
00037     if (ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetFont(name.c_str()) == 0)
00038         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Error, cannot load Font [" + name + "]");
00039     else
00040     {
00041         if (font != NULL)
00042             delete font;
00043         hgeFont* tmp = ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetFont(name.c_str());
00044         font = new hgeFont(tmp->getFontName());
00045         fontName = name;
00046     }
00047 }
00048 
00049 void TextRenderable::setBlendMode(const int& blendMode)
00050 {
00051     if (font != NULL)
00052         font->SetBlendMode(blendMode);
00053 }

00055 int TextRenderable::getBlendMode()
00056 {
00057     if (font != NULL)
00058         return font->GetBlendMode();
00059     return 0;
00060 }

00062 void TextRenderable::setColor(const hgeColor& color)
00063 {
00064     if (font != NULL)
00065         font->SetColor(color.GetHWColor());
00066 }

00068 hgeColor TextRenderable::getColor()
00069 {
00070     if (font != NULL)
00071         return hgeColor(font->GetColor());
00072     else
00073         return hgeColor(0, 0, 0, 0);
00074 }

00118 const double TextRenderable::getWidth()
00119 {
00120     if (font != NULL)
00121         return font->GetStringWidth(text.c_str());
00122     else
00123         return 0;
00124 }
00125 
00126 const double TextRenderable::getHeight()
00127 {
00128     if (font != NULL)
00129     {
00130         int numLines = 0;
00131         for (int i = 0; i < text.length(); ++i)
00132         {
00133             if (text[i] == '\n')
00134                 ++numLines;
00135         }
00136 
00137         return numLines * font->GetHeight();
00138     }
00139     else
00140         return 0;
00141 }

00163 void TextRenderable::render(SceneNode* const node, const hgeVector& screenPosition, Camera* const  cam)
00164 {
00165     if (font != NULL)
00166     {
00167         font->SetZ(node->getZ());
00168         font->SetScale(node->getWorldScale());
00169         font->Render(screenPosition.x, screenPosition.y, alignment, text.c_str());
00170     }
00171 }
